main: ^Hundred Islands is located in the northern Philippines in the province of Pangasinan. There are 124 pristine coral reef islands during high tide and 123 during low tide, is scattered across an area of 7.12 square miles with the above ground cliffs being comrprised of limestone.

c-0: ^The islands are believed to be about two million years old and the peculiar "mushroom-like" shapes of some of the islands were caused by the eroding action of ocean waves.
